subject: Engagement of fee (toll) collecting agency for collection of fee
text: #rrcfty 7yfu TITATff wifetaror PHO)NE 91-1 /-5074100 /5074200) (7134 4aat %<  (Tutif ~TTrr) Fex 91-14-501935017/5093514 Exin 2723/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of Indi: (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, SECTOA -|0, DWARKA, NEW DELFII-110045 No. NHAI/ 13013/15/02-03/CO-CMD / Valsad 6.1.2003 Circular no. NHAI / Commercial Operations/ 13 Sub: Engagement of fee (toll) collecting agency for collection of fee This is in continuation to our circular no. NHAI/ Commercial Operations/9 dated 22.10.02, NHAL/ Commercial Operations/ 10 dated 8.11.2002 and no. NHAI/ Commercial Operations  12 dated 15.11.2002, on above subject  As per present practice; the office of Director General of Resettlement (DGR) has been sponsoring name of individual ex-servicemen DGR has also agreed to sponsor empanelled  security agencies as well, since difficulties have been   expressed in engaging the individual ex- servicemen sponsored by them In this   regard, we are enclosing a copy of our letter no NHAI/ 13013/22/CMD-CO/DGR dated 23.12.2002 and their reply vide letter no. 212/SA/DGR/NHAI/ dated 26.12.2002 for your guidance: In earlier cases, where they have sponsored the name of individual ex-servicemen only, may also be talren up with DGR if considered necessary, for obtaining name of empanelled security agencies only. Emp
